thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Martinrea International Q4 Earnings Per Share C$0.37

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Martinrea International Q4 Earnings Per Share C$0.37
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Martinrea International Inc:
* . REPORTS RECORD QUARTERLY AND ANNUAL EARNINGS, CONTINUED STRONG MARGIN IMPROVEMENT, DECLARES DIVIDEND AND RAISES QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND FOR 2018
* Q4 SALES FELL 11.3 PERCENT TO C$878.6 MILLION * SEES Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE C$0.59 TO C$0.63 EXCLUDING ITEMS
* QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND WILL BE RAISED BY 50% TO $0.045 PER SHARE COMMENCING WITH Q1 OF 2018
* EXPECT FIRST QUARTER SALES, EXCLUDING TOOLING SALES, OF $840 MILLION TO $880 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW C$0.46, REVENUE VIEW C$883.9 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW C$0.54 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
